data.message: Please help me, I just received a friend request from myself so I think my account has been hacked. I'm very worried.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing this, Jean. Fake Timelines created to imitate real people are not allowed on Facebook. If someone created an account pretending to be you, we recommend reporting it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/1rpe8V8. -Jessica
Someone id sending out friend request with my name. Is there a simple way to change my password or block hackers?

We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Barbara. Fake accounts created to imitate real people are not allowed on Facebook. If someone created an account pretending to be you, we recommend reporting it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2aXacV1. -Jessica
I tried to change my password in settings, but couldn't get in, everytime I touched settings it just highlighted then went back to normal!
Trying to change password on my account it's been hacked Can't Find where or how to do this

Thanks for your question, Jackie. Having your account hacked means someone has logged into it without your permission. We can take you through a few steps to make sure any recent changes to your account were made by you as well as help you change your password and secure your account. To get started, visit: http://bit.ly/2mJ2F5o. -Elizabeth
